summary: Completed comprehensive testing of extended cashflow webapp with import and bank reconciliation functionality. All core features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of expected 422 for invalid date format
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling could be more precise

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 instead of expected 400 for invalid import type
minor_bugs.impact: Error handling could be more precise

design_issues.issue: File input is hidden (but this is normal for styled file inputs)

passed_tests: Import type selection (EPD declaraties, EPD particulier, BUNQ bank)
File upload interface with drag-and-drop zone
Bank reconciliation interface with matching suggestions
CSV import preview functionality (all 3 import types)
Tab switching between upload and reconciliation
Backend API endpoints for import and reconciliation
action_item_for_E1: Minor backend error handling improvements: Update error responses to return proper HTTP status codes (422 instead of 500) for validation errors in date format and import type validation.
